issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Change output format of castVARCHAR(timestamp) in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6137](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6137). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Format timestamp to yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.sss

comments.body:
